name: Retro Breakout
description:
The classic Breakout game, but with retrowave visuals!

Controls:

Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Move Paddle

Space - Launch Ball

P - Pause Menu

(Didn't use the Esc key so the game can be paused while in fullscreen)

Song and sounds used can be found below:

https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/333785/

https://freesound.org/people/Prof.Mudkip/sounds/386862/

https://freesound.org/people/MentosLat/sounds/417486/
